headline: Frontend Engineer · React + Product UX

impact: Rebuilt candidate dashboard widgets in React 19, cutting load time by 28%
Led accessibility sweep that fixed 35 WCAG blockers across the hiring portal

headline: Data Analyst · Python + BI
summary: Data storyteller who enjoys turning raw telemetry into campus placement insights. Comfortable with SQL tuning and visualization stacks.

impact: Automated Tableau refresh jobs that saved the team 5 hrs/week
Built anomaly detectors that surfaced 4 critical retention issues
